bio: I‚Äôm an engineering student with a strong passion for building impactful software solutions. In my leisure time, I actively contribute to open-source projects and engage with developer communities like Stack Overflow to both learn and assist others. I have hands-on experience with technologies such as Python, Node.js, Flutter, and Java, and have built several full-stack and cross-platform applications. Most of my projects are open-sourced and available on my GitHub, while a few are maintained as private repositories due to ongoing development or confidentiality.

1.name: KCET SmartPass
1.description: KCET SmartPass is a campus pass management app for students to apply and track leave, outpass, and hostel pass approvals digitally.(In Development Stage)

2.name: Med4Free
2.description: Med4Free is a donation-based platform that connects medicine donors with patients in need, enabling free access to unused, life-saving medicines.

3.name: Clean Rail
3.description: Clean Rail is a digital inspection system for Indian Railways that streamlines station and train cleanliness audits with section-wise scoring, remarks, and automated PDF reports.

4.name: Brain Tumor Detection
4.tech_stack_used: TensorFlow, CNN, OpenCV, and MRI Brain Tumor Dataset.
4.description: Brain Tumor Detection is a deep learning-based application that analyzes MRI scans to accurately identify and classify brain tumors, assisting in early diagnosis and treatment planning.

5.name: Dermo Detect
5.tech_stack_used: Python, TensorFlow, CNN, OpenCV, and HAM10000 dataset
5.description: Dermo Detect is a skin disease classification app that uses deep learning to identify dermatological conditions from images with high accuracy.(In Private Repo)

1.description: Completed the Google Play Academy Digital Marketing Certification, focusing on app growth, user acquisition, and Play Store optimization.

2.description: Recognized as the Best Performer in Project Punch by Beehive Communication Club for outstanding public speaking, communication, and presentation skills.

3.description: Currently developing ResQLink, a disaster relief and donation platform aimed at connecting donors with victims in real time to streamline aid distribution during emergencies in Tamil Nadu.

4.description: Solved 750+ programming problems on SkillRack, showcasing strong problem-solving abilities and consistent coding practice across various algorithmic challenges.

5.description: Completed the CCNA: Introduction to Networks (Module 1) certification by Cisco, gaining foundational knowledge in networking concepts, IP addressing, and network protocols.

6.description: Earned the Cisco Certified Ethical Hacker (Badge), showcasing foundational skills in ethical hacking, threat identification, and basic penetration testing techniques.
